original: 《 開局 》　　時期勢力選擇時，設定是否開啟「戰死」。　　關閉時，戰鬥過程包含單挑，武將不會死亡，　　僅能撤離與俘虜，君主不受此限制。
text: "Starting" 　　 When selecting a period power, set whether to enable "War to Death". When 　　 is closed, the battle will involve single-handed combat, and the generals will not die. 　　 can only evacuate and capture prisoners, and the monarch is not subject to this restriction.
